name: Nibbles (Pixel Raven)
description:
Nibbles

Sneak around the farm and eat all the farmers crops, but don't get caught! Hide away in bushes and chew through fences in this adorable rabbit's quest for a filling snack!

How to Play

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Nibble

P - Pause

Our Team!

Jimmy - Project Manager, 3D Models

Joseph - Gameplay Programming, Animations, Music, Texturing

Stephen - Gameplay Programming

Rui - Gameplay Programming, VFX, 3D Models, 2D Sprites

This game was made for GGJ 2023, check out the GGJ page HERE
